sentences.sContent: Our grateful thanks go to all who participated.
sentences.sCn: 我们衷心感谢所有参与者。

sentences.sContent: She gave me a grateful look.

synos.tran: 感谢的；令人愉快的，宜人的

remMethod.val: 注意不要和grate(v. 磨碎)弄混

trans.tranCn: 感激的， 感谢的； 受欢迎的
trans.tranOther: feeling that you want to thank someone because of something kind that they have done, or showing this feeling
